items of food: The table was laden with the choicest viands. There was an extensive assortment of viands available for the group when they arrived.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had eaten hardly anything for days so had vivid dreams of rich viands and fine wines.They sat down to a simple meal of cold viands that did little to cheer them.She set the viands down on the table and asked the company to serve themselves.
